mapper.insert: insert into coupon_inventory (cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount) values (#{crId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponQuantityGet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{faceValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changeGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{serviceCouponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update coupon_inventory set coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_quantity = #{couponQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_quantity_get = #{couponQuantityGet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, valid_time_start = #{validTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_time_end = #{validTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, face_value = #{faceValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, change_grade = #{changeGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_integral = #{changeIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_small = #{picSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_big = #{picBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_explain = #{couponExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, service_coupon_type = #{serviceCouponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where cr_id = #{crId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount from coupon_inventory where cr_id = #{crId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0

select cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount from coupon_inventory where delete_mark = 0

select cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount from coupon_inventory where delete_mark = 0 and product_id = #{productId} and enabled_mark in (1, 2)

select cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount from coupon_inventory where delete_mark = 0 and sku_id = #{skuId} and enabled_mark in (1, 2)
select count(0) from coupon_inventory where enabled_mark = 2 and delete_mark = 0 and coupon_type = #{couponType}

select count(0) from coupon_inventory where delete_mark = 0
and coupon_name like concat('%',#{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and valid_time_start > concat(#{startDateOne}, ' 0:0:0')
and valid_time_start < concat(#{startDateTwo}, ' 23:59:59')

select cr_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_quantity, coupon_quantity_get, valid_time_start, valid_time_end, face_value, change_grade, change_integral, pic_small, pic_big, product_id, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, coupon_explain, service_coupon_type, sku_id, discount from coupon_inventory where delete_mark = 0
and coupon_name like concat('%',#{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and valid_time_start >= concat(#{startDateOne}, ' 0:0:0')
and valid_time_start <= concat(#{startDateTwo}, ' 23:59:59')
order by create_date desc
limit #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT cp.cr_id AS crId, cp.coupon_name AS couponName, cp.coupon_type AS couponType, cp.service_coupon_type AS serviceCouponType, cp.coupon_quantity AS couponQuantity, cp.coupon_quantity_get AS couponQuantityGet, cp.valid_time_start AS validTimeStart, cp.valid_time_end AS validTimeEnd, cp.face_value AS faceValue, cp.discount AS discount, cp.change_grade AS changeGrade, cp.change_integral AS changeIntegral, cp.pic_small AS picSmall, cp.pic_big AS picBig, cp.sku_id AS skuId, ps.sku_name AS skuName, cp.product_id AS productId, pi.product_name AS productName, cp.coupon_explain AS couponExplain, cp.description AS description FROM coupon_inventory cp LEFT JOIN product_sku ps ON cp.sku_id = ps.sku_id LEFT JOIN product_info pi ON cp.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE cp.cr_id = #{crId}
